sentences.sContent: The following day the picture appeared on the front pages of every newspaper in the world.
sentences.sCn: 次日，照片出现在世界各地报纸的头版。

sentences.sContent: We went to dinner the following Monday evening.
sentences.sCn: 在接下来的那个周一晚上我们一起共进晚餐。

sentences.sContent: Write down the following information: name of product, type, date purchased and price.
sentences.sCn: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。

words.tran: 跟随；遵循；追求；密切注意

trans.tranCn: 其次的，接着的；下列的，下述的
trans.tranOther: The following day, week, or year is the day, week, or year after the one you have just mentioned
